description: Leading figures met this week to overcome the sectarian divides that are tearing their country apart.
title: Syria war: Society leaders hold secret peace summit in Berlin
title_page: Syria war: Society leaders hold secret peace summit in Berlin - BBC News
maintext: "These people see themselves as representatives of nearly 70% of Syrian society that does not side with the armed factions or with the regime or with whoever is waging war in this country," says Daniel Gerlach, a Middle East analyst who is helping the German-based Syrians who organised this meeting.
